title: King Charles
overview: King Charles, an hourly talk show, features the dynamic and unlikely duo of Gayle King and Charles Barkley, engaging each other, their guests, and their audience in freewheeling and authentic conversations centered around the week's most interesting stories, moments, and cultural themes. King keeps her long-running day job at rival CBS News, and the outspoken sportscaster Barkley remains a key figure in the NBA coverage provided by CNN's parent, Warner Bros. Discovery.
